Review: As I conducted all my meetings and agenda in Davao in this hotel, they went above and beyond what can be expected. Finding ways to accommodate me, a difficult guest with specific and difficult requests. You set the standard in customer service. May they all aim to be like you. Hat off..

From check in to room was very bad experience, told them that room was not cooling and was told that it will take time for air conditioning to work, room was like a furnace, later again I went down to front office to complain and they sent a guy to check again, this time at 9 pm they agreed that air conditioning was not working, 15 minutes later was asked to move another room, while moving my baggage I knocked the she of side lamp. Next morning was told that the lampshade was for 2100 php and they charged me for same, when I asked for discount for putting me in a furnace for 9 hours, the front office girl said that “ you already had been given discount by Agoda so no further discount for non functional air conditioning. It till 20 minutes for house keeping to call reception to clear that room was okay and I can check out. I have traveled all over the world and this was a nightmare
Great service, staff are polite
This may sound silly, but it is so nice to find a hotel that has ample hot water at peak times. Good and cheap food in the restaurant. Polite staff, nothing at all to fault the hotel.

A lovely large room with big and comfortable beds, fluffy and soft pillows come with it. Staff were amazing and easy to deal with (due to our number of requests and can attest that they are PWD friendly). Would have appreciated some tea to go with the complimentary coffee provided. Buffet breakfast was a steal with decent and tasty selection. We had a pleasant and relaxing stay here.

My wedding coordinator booked our room for our wedding preparation and I was satisfied with the service. The room is nice and the hotel's location is perfect for a prenup shoot. Would definitely stay there again.
Great location. Staff we're very friendly and accomodating. Rooms are old and daggy but the hotel looks great for functions and any occasions.
Very Good location

It was the first time for me and my son to travel alone together. So glad I booked Royal Mandaya. Wifi was strong, food was tasty and staff were really nice. Best value for money. Will be back for sure!
The staff , service and atmosphere is simply Hospitality at its very Best. I have booked my family in this hotel time and again, we don't have even one reason to complaint.
My home away from home. Always an enjoyable stay.
It's my 4th time to stay in this hotel and still they were able to maintain a very good service... will definitely recommend this hotel.
we enjoyed the hotel service and the buffet breakfast. the pool is okey, room is renovated.
Get the Delux rooms because it is in the newer section of the hotel.

The aircon compressor of the room was defective that's why the room was not cold. We called the front desk and told us that we will be transferred to the other room. We were so disgusted because we were transferred into an old room. The bed sheets also smells old..It was already 12midnight that's why we just didn't complain again since we were so tired already and we wanted to rest. Just an unhappy client.
food is great value for your money. so may fruits and food was delicious. Very friendly staff! Definitely you can be proud of people of Davao!

The room we had has a view of the city and the sea. The Air conditioning is leaking. We called someone to take a look at it however no one came. The towels smell odd. The smell like it has been there for some time and wasn't change or washed.The pool is enticing in the pictures on the website however when we were there it's small and guest like us need to share it with people from outside since they have a summer training ongoing. It was just disappointing that you can't enjoy the pool since it was too crowded. There was no safe where we can put our valuables and keep it secure whenever we need to go out. We used our luggage bag instead. My son notice that the elevator smell liked vinegar that you can't even stand it. We need to hold our breath whenever we use the lifts. Moreover, the food that was served everyday for breakfast were so delicious and made us full. The location of the Hotel is so convenient that some of the tourist spots in Davao are walking distance too bad it's raining so much when we had our vacation.
The hotel look old but clean ... everything good... location is amazing in the central of Davau
I was very disappointed that i was not warned that there was a very loud disco venue across the road which kept us awake till late at night.

We are disappointed about the behavior of some guests .They made too much noise at night , indeed they talked lowdly in the corridor and don't care if some people are sleeping.Mandaya should choose more carefuly their customers or warn them better.
located in what probably was the city center ages ago, hotel needs sprucing up. a/c was freezing, room was quite small and dark. I guess guests pay for the location and not for the amenities...

Friendly and very accommodating Hotel. Good clean and very safe location. The staff are very helpful, happy and top service all the time. I would gladly recommend this Hotel for friendliness, cleanliness, location, value for money and of course for varieties of food on offers.

The worst experience I had with the hotel was the elevator conking out. I was booked a superior room and it smelled musty. The curtains had me sneezing, which tells me these have not been washed for a while. The walls were thin-- I could listen to the couple at the next room arguing over "biko" and "durian".
Old rooms. Good breakfast selection. Not worth the price.

We stayed here for 4 days and 3 nights for a vacation with my parents. Buffet breakfast is superb, location is good as it is in downtown area and easy access to stores and restaurants, facilities okay. I can say that we had a great stay in this hotel except for their staff at the front desk upon check in. I was very disappointed with the way their front liners handled us when we checked in. Check in agents need more training! It was such a horrible experience that on my next travel to Davao, I would look for other hotels to stay.

Our wedding was held here but the head assigned to their wedding celebrations named katrina , is very unprofessional and always changes her mind., she would give us options then after choosing one of the option she would change the inclusions. She's the worst kind to deal with due to inconsistencies and that would definitely make this hotel hard to love because of her. Would not recommend this place as wedding reception to those who are planning to get married.

Generally a good place to stay while in Davao. Great value for money in a good location. My room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. However, the bedsheets were old and the bed was pushed against the corner wall causing external sounds to vibrate which compromised an otherwise comfortable sleeping experience.
Hotel is old , not very nice at all. 2 star hotel The one plus was a good breakfast buffet.
good but not that good....
No smoking anywhere in Davao , so be warned.
nice hotel. near city center. they have good buffet breakfast.

This is an old hotel that needs overhauling, mattress and pillows are ok but not very comfortable. The shower heads are so strong like a fire hose. It does not have any settings. The hotel is situated in a very crowded city center. The only this i like is the nice lobby and sumptous breakfast buffet. The check in process was a disappointment, we booked 3 rooms and upon arrival at almost 5pm 1 room we booked is still not ready to occupy. After an all day sightseeing tour and with 3 elderly in our group of course i was upset. The room key cards malfunctioned in all 3 rooms that we had to go up and down to the lobby for a replacement at least 10x and i'm not exaggerating.
The place is nice, perfect location near to night market ... i love the breakfast awesome

I stayed there for two weeks during Christmas. A reasonable hotel which is clean with friendly staff. However, facilities are limited and the rooms are dated - at least the rooms in the old wing are (which is where we were located). The hotel's main focus seems to be on business travellers and the community and it can be somewhat crowded and noisy at times.
better hotel to stay
better place to stay
All thd staff are very nice and polite
Nice friendly staff, good service. The only problem is the restaurant can be very crowded due to events held almost daily in the banquet room.
I like the place allthe staff are good and polite . The service are good i have no complain at all
n/a
Very good breakfast
We will probably stay in the same hotel with my family from Germany.
Great service, good internet, clean hotel, friendly staff
Everything are not bad!!!!!
Staffs are friendly and very accommodating. Rooms and common areas are very clean. I would definitely recommend your hotel to my friends.
Just happy during stay.
I stay here many times everything is good i loved the breakfast here and the frontdesk and staff is nice and friendly
If you want an affordable hotel in Davao you may want to consider Royal Mandaya.

I stayed at the Royal Mandaya for 4 nights. This hotel impressed me. While the hotel can benefit from better surroundings, you forget all that once you enter the lobby. It is clean, spacious, fresh. But the strength of the Mandaya is really in its staff - from the guards, to the doormen, to the reception, to everyone at room service. They attend to your concern with a smile and a genuine disposition to assist in every way. This is a hotel that takes care of their staff, who in turn take good care of their guests. Thank you. Next time I am back in Davao, I will make it a point to stay there.

I stayed at the Royal Mandaya for 4 nights. This hotel impressed me. While the hotel can benefit from better surroundings, you forget all that once you enter the lobby. It is clean, spacious, fresh. But the strength of the Mandaya is really in its staff - from the guards, to the doormen, to the reception, to everyone at room service. They attend to your concern with a smile and a genuine disposition to assist in every way. This is a hotel that takes care of their staff, who in turn take good care of their guests. Thank you. Next time I am back in Davao, I will make it a point to stay there.
thumbs up.

Stayed at Royal Mandaya on recommendation of colleagues and it was near the sites we needed to visit for work. Our stay was generally pleasant, though the concierge did not direct us where our rooms were and ended on the wrong wing while lugging our stuff around (please tell your desk staff to assist those checking in). Food was good and the restau staff were attentive. Rooms were clean and not smelly. Would recommend this hotel for business travelers.

Stayed at Royal Mandaya on recommendation of colleagues and it was near the sites we needed to visit for work. Our stay was generally pleasant, though the concierge did not direct us where our rooms were and ended on the wrong wing while lugging our stuff around (please tell your desk staff to assist those checking in). Food was good and the restau staff were attentive. Rooms were clean and not smelly. Would recommend this hotel for business travelers
Nice location with amenities surrounding, can walk for lunch and dinner
Central and ease to move around. Can walk to nearby eating places - very local delicacies. Have a great range of breakfast buffet

A very nice experience at this hotel. It has the presence of a big hotel but there are some staff members who make it feel like you are a welcome guest at a smaller homey place. The buffet breakfast has enough to fill you. I cannot eat Filipino food so the hot stuff is a no go area. Still they have someone who will cook you eggs any style. The security when you go in is tight but that is not a bad thing, the search of your bags. I enjoyed staying here and I will in future.
Location is great, about 45 mins to 1 hour from the airport. Great to move around for street food, and would rate the hotel about 3 star. Rather worn out but can be refurbish and renovated

Great location...without walking distance to place like convenient store and eating place like Penong's. Many shops around the hotel. But there are limited available items from the hotel - like weighing scale or hair dryer. But overall is great value

Great Staff all very helpful, had problem with my tv they were up in 5 minutes to fix, Great desk staff very helpful at all times, Excellent buffet breakfast with different variety daily, Great rooms and room service if you want to order a meal in your room, Well done Royal Mandaya hotel I will be back A+++
Will be back with my grandson next year
Only one bed was in the room, we paid for 3 beds for 3 people but it was taken cared of right away.
Cabinet Has no cover.
Staff very friendly and helpful but information provided not consistent. Rooms booked for 3 adults per room, but bathroom supplies and linens only provided for 2. Overall, a pleasant stay.
Sad because no smorking area
Second time to the hotel. The staffs are just as friendly and helpful as before but internet is as poor as before
Great breakfast buffet nice pool roosters in the morning
Staffs were very polite and helpful. I felt very safe when the security had to write down the taxi plate number
NA
Hotel staff are very accommodating.
Just the way we want it.

We love the breakfast buffet as always. The staffs were all courteous, kind and helpful. We should give big credit to the security guards who are always quick to call cab/taxi as soon as you step outside. They always give you a little stub as your copy for the taxi name and plate number you're taking which is a good safety measure.
Nothing especially
The hotel was nice,clean and the staff are so accommodating and friendly. The location is accessible anywhere from foods and shopping area.

This is a very good place to stay. It is probably one of the more upmarket hotels in Davao City but not at the same price as the top end. The staff are very pleasant and eager to please. I find that it is a pleasure staying at this hotel. when i come back to davao i will definetly stay here again. The breakfast is good also. Ok the hot stuff is Filipino and may not suit the foreigners palate like me, but considering the majority of the stayers are locals I can understand that. But there are many other items in the buffet to which will fill your breakfast needs. I am very happy with this hotel. I do recommend value for money to stay here.
Staff wanted additional fees after guest checked-out and had to fees to use use swimming pool. Need a lot of improvements in providing guest comfort
Nice and clean place. Breakfast buffet was good.I would stay again.

This is our second stay here. Pleased with the hotel, and if you can accept that the WiFi is intermittent, it's a good value. Rooms are nice, perhaps a bit small, but really no complaints. Shower pressure is good. Hotel food is good. Staff is nice. We stay most of the time in a more expensive hotel, but stay here the first couple of nights to save a bit of money, and plan to stay here again for two nights next time. Haven't checked out the pool yet. Plan to next time. Overall, pleased with the hotel.
Breakfast buffet was yummy, hotel was nice and clean and staff were friendly
Good value for money, staff was nice and the breakfast buffet was really delicious.

We got the Agoda deal for a Superior room with breakfast. Not too expensive but the room is so spacious for two persons! There is a refrigerator, a LED TV, a clothes rack and a round table. The shower room (offers hot and cold water) is spacious too with 2 standard body towels and 2 face towels. Free pool access included. No additional cost for the extra beach towels. Excellent WiFi connection that I was able to stream an hour long video without any lag! AC is a super yes too! Unlike an inn we went after, the AC here is way much cooler. Lastly, the buffet breakfast is more than satisfactory! Heavy breakfast meal just right for a day-long city/Samal Island tour. We'll definitely recommend this with friends and other travelers! My boyfriend even wants us to go back here when we visit Davao again in the next Kadayawan Festival.
The breakfast buffet was except. Room furnitures were old. No bidet. Aircon defective. Tables and chairs very old. Needs renovation.
Ideally located Friendly helpful staff at the front desk,security,and at breakfast time
Staffs are accomodating Very near to Peoples Park, very good location😀
After 4 years, the service is still top notch!

This hotel has not evolved with the times. Room lighting was so poor that I had to use the "flashlight app' on my phone to read the numbers on my ccard...with all of the room lights on. Room internet was slower than 1980 dial-up.... and it did not work at all after 8 a.m. They have a "business center" with a hard wired desktop that I was able to get on line with after a long wait for it to boot up. I had to print on a printer that only had used paper available. Booking a flight and checking my email took long hours. Totally non-functional if you need to communicate or do any business on line. Computer desk was hand made with a straight back chair. No lights in the business center. More like a large closet with windows. The neighborhood is not tourist friendly for foreign tourist. It is a long taxi ride to any of the better malls. The menu in the room shows only the over-priced items. If you go down to the pool area you will pay about 30% of the room service prices and have a better selection. Room was noisy from music played at the pool area. Breakfast buffet was very good. Bathroom and bed was good. I have a rental property in Davao but live on a farm in del Norte when I am in the Philippines. I usually stay at the Red Planet in Davao and in Luzon. It was not available this time so I took this hotel. This one was more expensive but cannot beat red planet hotel for internet, TV, location and value. I hope this helps my fellow travelers and I also hope it help that hotel fix these issues.... at least the internet and the lighting. KuyaKano

The only thing that was good with this stay was the breakfast and the singer by the pool. The room was so dirty, cockroaches, room so tiny, bathroom was gross!!! The towels are gray in color instead of white. They need to use some Clorox. The rooms really needs to be renovated. I paid for a 4 star hotel and got a 1 star or even 0 star. It's just like staying at Motel 6 maybe motel 6 is even better. The hotels condition really ruined my only 2 days vacation in Davao. I really do not understand why they were rated 4 star. We asked to be moved to another room but they said they were booked - we truly believe they were lying too. I am asking for the hotel industry to recheck this hotel to properly rate it.
Very Good
They refused to cancel my 2nd night despite the 24 hours notice. Worst, the room shower drain was not working and I could not take a bath!

Check-in: Was okay. We were checked in as early as 7am, which was good because we had a business to attend to at 9am. Hospitality: Staff were nice, welcoming, helpful. Room: Sigh. This is where it starts to get really bad. Our room was on the third floor where the grill was, and there was a band that played every night I think. We could hear them from our room, though it was tolerable. Right as you exit the elevator to the 3rd floor you will realize ventilation is not so good in this place. But it gets worse in the room. I had colds already, but the poor ventilation (you could tell by the smell) in the room made it harder for me to breathe. So to make things easier for me, I checked if I could open the windows—I could, but the bad thing is that it was unlocked and I know people could open it from outside. Security issues. There were also a lot of mosquitoes. TV was working, but there were not many channels and they were redundant, which was annoying every time I surfed. Toilet and bath: Pretty basic. Surprisingly, the condition is not much worse than the condition of the room. I always bring my toiletries, so I can't say much about theirs. Internet: Did not work half the time we were there. When it did, it was slow anyway so I had to use my mobile provider's mainly. Location: There's a bank nearby, convenience and drug stores, a few minutes away is a mall... Definitely would not stay here again.

Stayed here for just 1 night with my family (siblings, parents and aunts). The hotel is located at the city center where there are a lot of establishments nearby. For the price of the stay, the value we got was more than what we paid for. Hotel personnel were very service-oriented, friendly and polite. There are 2 buildings on the hotel (old and new wing). Some of us stayed in the old and some stayed in the new. Even if the rooms in the old wing is already showing age, it still remains decent and clean. For those a bit picky on this, the new wing would suit their needs.

The hotel staffs are attentive & friendly, location is in the downtown area, buffet breakfast is good. However, the hotel need a little renovation and new paint to cope up with other new hotels in davao. Likewise, my 2 dragon companions are complaining and having a hard time finding a smoking area since the city is a NO SMOKING ZONE hahaha... Davao is Not for SMOKERS!
Great location and friendly staff. Will stay here again next time.
Would recommend to friends and family.
Hotel with good facilities in the hearth of Davao City
Staff not attentive to clients need on breakfast table. Need to remind top up of toiletries
Room is A-ok. And the staff were so amazing and very accommodating.they always have buffet at a very reasonable price.
Hospitality at its very best. Sincere thanks to the entire management.
Value for money
It was a great stay.
Excellent staff from concierge to front desk to buffet staff
Comfortable and clean. Nice bath :)
Good
My room is in good location facing the pool. Staffs are friendly. Good breakfast presenation. Nice lobby and good value of money.
Excellent service from the staff.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay very much, the staff was always very courteous and very accommodating. The breakfast was excellent and the preparation, presentation and variety of dishes was also one of the best parts of our stay. The room was spacious and well appointed. Those are all the pros now for the cons. As a couple, it would have been nice if we would have had two face towels, the TV channels was difficult to operate. As for the internet, it worked well but it took a little while to figure out. Overall, I would highly recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a hotel that is clean and with a positive and courteous staff to stay. I will be staying there again. God Bless!

I was so disappointed with my entire stay in this hotel... Housekeeping was so dishonest and not good in cleaning at all... Did not replace my towels for my 2nd day stay,and left the pillow case in my luggage...good thing i fixed my luggages before checking out..front desk incharge are rude in answering phone.. Did not inform me that they keep changing the wifi password..so i have to ask everyday which the receptionist answers rudely and put the phone first... I mean, i paid for my stay so i should have atleast get a good service... I eas acused of getting the towels...which it is so humilliating..knowing i travel and checked in hotels so much... And its the housekeeping is the dishonest one... No bathrobs and shower gel, bar soap only they have... Squeeking noisy sound in my bed..so its kinda uncomfortable... REALLY A VERY BAD EXPERIENCE!!! I will never go to this hotel ever!!,

I was staying at a cheaper hotel just down the street and I was tired of the total disregard of its customers. So I thought for an extra approx $20 a night I would try the Royal Mandaya. Once I entered the lobby, I knew I made the right move. The customer service was excellent, even bringing me a drink at check-in for free. The room was also great with all the comforts needed for a hotel stay. The pool area was nice and relaxing also. The free breakfast in the morning was excellent with once again great customer service and a vast variety of food to choose from. Peoples Park is a 5 minute walk away and a great place for jogging, walking, picture taking, etc... I now know where I will stay everytime I will be in Davao City and I am looking forward to my next visit.
The buffet breakfast was good. Big room.

I came late from Kidapawan and was greeted by the superb front desk staff. My room was perfect for a tired traveler like me. A bit old but very comfortable room. In the morning, had a wonderful breakfast... The hotel staff are consistently courteous and warm! Wish to go back again!
Extra friendly staff. The breakfast is excellent buffet worth the price of the room!
Breakfast buffet is very good. Facility a bit run down. Could do a better job cleaning unused areas. Overall still a good place to stay.

Friendly, efficient staff. Restaurant food was good and reasonably priced. Good security outside the lobby before entering hotel, which I like. Only down side was WiFi was intermittent. Was only there for one night so we dealt with it fine. A longer stay with WiFi problems may not have been fun, but perhaps it was just an off day for that. Would be glad to stay there again.

Our stay there was awesome! Food is good. Employees and staff are all nice. But we encountered problems with our key card, 2x and even after having it updated. I just felt that they could have done more or offered more to make up for the inconvenience.

When we arrived here, from the welcoming security to the customer service staff in the reception/lobby area, we felt that our stay in Davao will be a good one. All staff are courteous and really helpful. The buffet breakfast is really good, value for your money. The location of the hotel is very much accessible from all the tourist attractions of Davao City. I just hope they will improve the wireless connection as there are times that the wifi speed is quite slow but overall it is ok. I will recommend this to my family and friends who will spend their vacation in Davao. All hotel staff are well commended. Thank you for making our Davao vacation worth it.
i enjoy my stay here
Value for Money, Staff Performance, and Location

Location. Amenities. Breakfast buffet
(1) the staffs were very friendly and helpful (2) location is fine but not excellent (3) the room are spacious enough and clean
Great value hotel with excellent service, comfortable room and nice buffet breakfast. Central location.

Great lobby and friendly staff, during our stay 1 of the elevator was under maintenance. Rooms are spacious enough for couples. The best thing is its right in the heart of the city where everything is walking distance.
clean, serene, and comfortable
It was a nice short business stay. I will come again.
good

It doesn't fail me nor disappoint me every time i choose The Royal Mandaya Hotel. perfect location, breakfast is good, staff are amazing. service is excellent. I can't wait to stay again next year for my next vacation. all the best.

Staff very friendly and accomodating. Food great. Spacious room.

The room was so comfortable to be in, the staff were great and very polite, and 20 mins from the SM Lanang plaza by taxi.

Das Hotel hat eine gute Lage und jeder Taxifahrer findet es problemlos. Die Zimmer sind nicht mehr modern, aber es hat alles funktioniert und es ist sauber. Wer gerne einen schönen Pool möchte, sollte ein anderes Hotel wählen, denn die Poolarea lädt nicht zum bleiben ein. Das Personal war stets freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wirklich nervig war das sehr instabile Wifi, für das erst noch jeden Tag an der Rezeption ein neuer Zugangscode abgeholt werden musste. Was soll den dieser Blödsinn?

Hotel ist gut, Frühstück abwechslungsreich, der Pool ist nicht gut, stellenweise z.Bsp. die Handreling der Aufzüge, sind Renovierungen nötig, die Hotelzimmer sind leider etwas hellhörig, das Personal ist sehr freundlich, gut ausgebildet und hilfsbereit, das Hotel wird viel von Geschäftsleuten genutz und wurde auch für Presssekonferenzen zur neuen Präsidentenwahl ausbewählt, das Hotel ist eine gute Wahl

スタッフのみなさんが声かけてきます。 気持ちがいいですね。 バスルームがインロックしてしまったのてすが、対応が早かったです。 朝食が美味しいとレビューに書いてありましたが、普通かな。 ルームサービスでテンダーロインステーキを頼みましたが酷いものでした。 もっともフィリピンで美味しいステーキ食ったことないですが。 日本のファミレスステーキの方が1000倍うまい。 また泊まるとことはありますね。 結構 満足しましたよ。
ここのスタッフは皆さん感じがよいですね。 びっくりするくらい 気を使ってくれます。 また泊まりたいな～と思いますよ、そりゃ。
１Ｆレストランがリニューアルオープンして少し高級感を感じた。 各エリアスタッフもいい感じです。 部屋の中での会話は廊下に筒抜けですので○○○をすると時はＴＶのボリュームを大きめにして！？
Hospitality is really good. Staff there is always friendly. Whenever I visit Davao, I stay at Mandaya. The dining floor was renovated and became more spacious than before so I felt more comfortable.

４泊しました。この価格帯ではダバオでナンバー１です。サービス、立地、スタッフ、食事、設備、セキュリティ、何も問題なし。 特に良かった点は、朝食のビュッフェ。種類が豊富でメニューが日替わりします。初日のスープはブラロスープでした。美味しくいただきました。 洗濯は、ホテルを出てすぐ右のランドリーにお願いできます。Rushサービスでお願いすると、朝出して午後一に受け取れます。安いです。 ホテルのスタッフはよく教育されており、すれ違いざまに必ず挨拶をします。 立地も最高で、徒歩５〜７分の圏内に、ぺノン、イナサル、パン屋、各種銀行、７イレブン、ピープルズパークなど何でもあります。何も困りません。１０分歩けばサンペドロ教会にも行けます。 気になった点はエアコンの水漏れ。 次回もここにお世話になろうと思います。サラマト
設備は古いが良いホテル
ステッフがとても良い、ホテルと同じ５星です。 レストランやプールサイドの生演奏もとても良いです。 Davaoで泊まるならマンダヤでしょう！
ダバオはこのホテルがＮＯ１でスタッフも★★★★★です。 いつもお世話になっております。 人気なのでなかなか取れない時もあります。 ホテル内もリニューアルしていますので良いホテルです。

すれ違うスタッフ皆、挨拶する。スルーした人いないんじゃないかな？ ホスピタリティに溢れ、皆さんキチンと教育されてるスタッフです。wifi 良好。プールはちょいと古い感じのプールでした。1組の親子のみ利用してたかな。 残念なのは朝食のビュッフェ。朝6時過ぎに行ってもう温かい料理ではなかった。 あと自分、8階に泊まってましたが真夜中過ぎて上の階から爆音が！ガガガって何かを破砕する音？が朝方まで続きました。まぁ寝れないよね。何の音か気になり、翌日上の階へ。上の階には結婚式等をする、ホールと入り口手前にトイレがありどうやらトイレを改修してたっぽいですね。これは大減点ですよ…。 それ以外はパーフェクトでした。 素敵な接客をありがとう。 全部ひっくるめてもまた泊まりたいかな。あとエントランス出て右、直ぐ左折したところにレストランがあるんですがそこのシシッグ激うまです。
いつも常宿にしているので　スタッフがとても親切で対応が良いのだが シャワーのお湯のでが　10時過ぎると　とても悪い
ロケーションは並みながらオールスタッフの笑顔と挨拶が良い。 たまに、お湯の出が悪いが常夏の国ならではの事。 北側部屋は朝犬の吠える声が５時ごろから始まり、小学校の朝礼が７時くらいからはじまる。 南側部屋の方が良い。 朝食は４日サイクルです。コックはとても良い。 日本みたいなホテルと区別しないで楽しむべきです。
喫煙所がホテル内には無く　隣にある汚い民家で１回につき３ペソを払ってタバコを吸うかマルコポーロホテルの喫煙所まで行って煙草を吸う事になる
設備古いがﾒﾝﾃされていて問題ﾅｼ ﾏﾙｺやｾﾀﾞなんかよりｻ-ﾋﾞｽは良い（価格は半額） ｺｽﾊﾟ良いので、予約獲りずらい
水廻りは老朽化が進み、厳しい感じでした。ダバオのホテルではコストパフォーマンス高い方だと思います。
施設そのものは少し古いが、スタッフの対応がフィリピンらしい 明るく、笑顔いっぱい　気持ちよかった。 旧正月で予約が取れず、旅の後半は近くのAPO　VIEWへ移ったが　従業員が暗く、対照的だった。バイチャーを印刷して提出しろと言われ、おまけに部屋はプールのすぐ横で、カーテンを開けると動物園の折のごとく、じろじろと見られた。
私は常連客なのでスタッフ一同顔見知りです。 とても良いホテルです。
今回はに2回目の宿泊だったが最悪だった、次は別のホテルに予約します。
安くて、朝食もおいしいので人気ホテルです。 スタッフは冗談が通じるので、自分をアピールして顔を覚えてもらうと 楽しい宿泊になります。 朝７時前はお湯がぬるいので注意。
サービスは、全くダメ。セーフティボックスは無い。部屋は狭いし臭いし。全室禁煙。隣のレストランに3ペソ払って、タバコを吸いに行かないとダメ。
常連客なので、ホテルスタッフが良くしてくれるので快適に過ごせる。
マルコポーロの近隣にあり部屋からのロケーションは変わらず 食事も他国籍料理は無いがとてもおいしいです。
レビューの評価で選んだが、古い暗い部屋で数日過ごすのはつらかった。 朝食は2日で飽きた。 スタッフの対応もイマイチ。 良いのは立地とシャワーの水圧だけ。
設備は、少し古いが その分 サービスはGood
ダバオには年６回ほど行きますが、いろいろホテルを変えて宿泊していましたが、立地・朝食・各配置スタッフなどの面で５星クラス並みだと思います。今ではマンダヤを定宿にしています。 マルコポーロと変わらないし金額的にも安いのでなかなか予約が取れない。
夜間のお風呂が温いが他は最高　チェックインがスムーズ、ルームサービス、食事、ドアボーイ、フィリピンで最高、（マルコポーロは　チェックが厳格すぎ　格式が高く　庶民には　合わない。友人が宿泊）

Ta aldrig detta hotell även fast dom har rea. Du kommer att ångra dig. Och lämna ALDRIG några som hellst grejer eller mat till dom. Du kommer inte få tillbaks dom.
직원들이 친절하고 웰컴과일도 신경을 썼다. 아침부페는 이번 여행중 최고. 아포뷰 호텔은 게임이 안된다. 마닐라 래밍텬 호텔도 마찬가지. 아침부페는 만다야 호텔이 최고다.
아주 오래된 호텔이었네요. 좋은 곳인줄 알았는데 많이 허름했습니다. 직원들 인사성은 최고네요.
다바오가 워낙 큰 도시라 위치가 어떻다고는 말할 수 없지만 가까이에 피플스 파크가 있고 택시로 15분이면 산타안나 부두로 이동할 수 있어 너무나 좋았다. 특히 직원들이 너무 친절하여 금새 사귈 수 있었고 한 달 전 여행에서 15명에 가까운 직원들의 사진을 찍었기에 이번에 모두 인화된 사진을 선물할 수 있었다.
호텔은 좀 오래된 것 같으나 직원들이 너무 친절하고 사귐성이 좋음. 모두가 내 스마트폰 모델들입니다. 정말 나이스 합니다. 식사 정말 맛 있어요.
